storyTitle: As Project Manager, I want to generate schedule reports to achieve visibility into planned activities and timelines

testCases.title: Generate schedule report with valid filters
preconditions: User is logged in as Project Manager with valid credentials
User has authorization to access schedule reporting functionality
Schedule database contains test data with multiple projects, teams, and date ranges
Reporting system is accessible and operational

steps.action: Navigate to Schedule Reporting section from the main dashboard
steps.expectedResult: Schedule report UI is displayed with filter options including date range, team, and project dropdowns

steps.action: Select valid date range using the date picker (e.g., start date: 01/01/2024, end date: 31/01/2024)
steps.expectedResult: Date range is populated in the filter fields without validation errors

steps.action: Select a valid team from the team filter dropdown
steps.expectedResult: Team filter displays selected team name and is accepted without errors

steps.action: Select a valid project from the project filter dropdown
steps.expectedResult: Project filter displays selected project name and filters are accepted without errors

steps.action: Click the 'Generate Report' button to submit report generation request
steps.expectedResult: Schedule report is generated and displayed within 5 seconds showing timelines, resource assignments, and activities matching the selected filters

steps.action: Verify report contains accurate data including project name, team name, date range, activities, and resource assignments
steps.expectedResult: Report displays all expected data fields with correct values matching the applied filters

postconditions: Schedule report is successfully generated and displayed on screen
Report data matches the selected filter criteria
System logs the report generation activity
User remains on the schedule reporting page

testCases.title: Export schedule report to PDF and Excel
preconditions: User is logged in as Project Manager with valid credentials
User has authorization to export schedule reports
Schedule report has been successfully generated and is displayed on screen
Browser allows file downloads
User has write permissions to the download directory

steps.action: Generate schedule report with valid filters (date range, team, and project)
steps.expectedResult: Report is displayed on screen with complete schedule data including timelines and resource assignments

steps.action: Click the 'Export to PDF' button
steps.expectedResult: PDF file is downloaded to the default download location with filename format 'ScheduleReport_YYYYMMDD_HHMMSS.pdf'

steps.action: Open the downloaded PDF file
steps.expectedResult: PDF opens successfully and contains correct report data matching the on-screen report including all filters, timelines, and resource assignments with proper formatting

steps.action: Return to the schedule report page and click the 'Export to Excel' button
steps.expectedResult: Excel file is downloaded to the default download location with filename format 'ScheduleReport_YYYYMMDD_HHMMSS.xlsx'

steps.action: Open the downloaded Excel file
steps.expectedResult: Excel file opens successfully and contains correct report data matching the on-screen report with proper column headers, data rows, and formatting

steps.action: Verify both exported files contain identical data to the on-screen report
steps.expectedResult: Both PDF and Excel exports contain accurate and complete schedule information matching the displayed report

postconditions: PDF file is successfully downloaded and contains accurate report data
Excel file is successfully downloaded and contains accurate report data
Export operations are logged in the system
User remains on the schedule reporting page
Original report remains displayed on screen

testCases.title: Verify real-time update of schedule report
preconditions: User is logged in as Project Manager with valid credentials
Schedule report is generated and displayed for a specific project
User has access to backend system or test data modification interface
Real-time update mechanism is enabled and functional
WebSocket or polling mechanism is active for live updates

steps.action: Open schedule report for a specific project with current schedule data visible
steps.expectedResult: Report is displayed showing current schedule information including activities, timelines, and resource assignments

steps.action: Note the current values displayed in the report (e.g., activity dates, resource names, timeline milestones)
steps.expectedResult: Current report data is documented for comparison after update

steps.action: Update schedule data in backend system (e.g., modify activity date, change resource assignment, or update timeline)
steps.expectedResult: Backend data is successfully updated and saved in the schedule database

steps.action: Monitor the report UI without refreshing the page
steps.expectedResult: Report UI updates automatically within 10 seconds showing a visual indicator of data refresh

steps.action: Verify updated data is reflected in the report by comparing with the noted original values
steps.expectedResult: Report shows latest schedule information with all modified fields displaying the new values accurately

steps.action: Verify timestamp or last updated indicator shows recent update time
steps.expectedResult: Report displays current timestamp indicating the real-time update occurred

postconditions: Schedule report displays the most current data from the database
Real-time update mechanism is confirmed functional
Updated data is accurately reflected in the report
System maintains connection for future real-time updates
Update activity is logged in the system

storyTitle: As Project Manager, I want to filter schedule reports by team to achieve focused insights on team-specific schedules

testCases.title: Filter schedule report by valid team
preconditions: User is logged in as Project Manager with valid credentials
User has authorization to access schedule reporting functionality
Schedule database contains data for multiple teams
At least one team has associated schedule data available
Team filter dropdown is populated with valid team options

steps.action: Navigate to Schedule Reporting section from the main dashboard
steps.expectedResult: Schedule report UI is displayed with all filter options including team filter dropdown

steps.action: Click on the team filter dropdown to view available teams
steps.expectedResult: Dropdown expands showing a list of valid teams with team names and identifiers

steps.action: Select a valid team from the filter dropdown (e.g., 'Development Team A')
steps.expectedResult: Team filter is applied and displays the selected team name in the filter field

steps.action: Click the 'Generate Report' button to generate the filtered report
steps.expectedResult: Report is generated within 5 seconds and displays schedule data only for the selected team

steps.action: Verify all displayed activities, resources, and timelines belong to the selected team
steps.expectedResult: Report contains only schedule entries associated with the selected team, with no data from other teams visible

steps.action: Check report header or filter summary section
steps.expectedResult: Report clearly indicates the team filter is active and shows the selected team name

postconditions: Schedule report displays only team-specific data
Team filter remains applied and visible
Report is ready for export if needed
Filter selection is logged in the system
User remains on the schedule reporting page

testCases.title: Handle invalid team filter input
preconditions: User is logged in as Project Manager with valid credentials
User has access to schedule reporting functionality
Schedule reporting page is loaded and accessible
Team filter field accepts manual input or can be manipulated

steps.action: Navigate to Schedule Reporting section
steps.expectedResult: Schedule report UI is displayed with team filter field available

steps.action: Enter an invalid team identifier in the team filter field (e.g., 'INVALID_TEAM_999' or special characters like '@#$%')
steps.expectedResult: System displays a validation error message such as 'Invalid team selection. Please select a valid team from the list.'

steps.action: Verify the error message is clearly visible and user-friendly
steps.expectedResult: Error message is displayed in red text near the team filter field with clear instructions

steps.action: Attempt to click the 'Generate Report' button with invalid team filter
steps.expectedResult: Report generation is blocked and system prevents submission, displaying message 'Please correct the errors before generating the report.'

steps.action: Clear the invalid input and select a valid team from the dropdown
steps.expectedResult: Validation error disappears and team filter accepts the valid selection

steps.action: Click 'Generate Report' button with valid team filter
steps.expectedResult: Report is successfully generated with the valid team filter applied

postconditions: Invalid team input is rejected by the system
Validation error message is displayed to the user
Report generation is prevented until valid input is provided
System maintains data integrity by blocking invalid filters
Error handling is logged for monitoring purposes

storyTitle: As Project Manager, I want to export schedule reports in Excel format to achieve flexible data analysis

testCases.title: Export schedule report to Excel
preconditions: User is logged in with Project Manager role
User has authorization to export schedule reports
Schedule data exists in the system
Browser supports file downloads
Network connection is stable

steps.action: Navigate to the schedule reports section
steps.expectedResult: Schedule reports page is displayed with available report options

steps.action: Select the desired schedule parameters (date range, project, resources)
steps.expectedResult: Schedule parameters are selected and highlighted in the interface

steps.action: Click the 'Generate Report' button
steps.expectedResult: Schedule report is generated and displayed on screen with all selected data including tasks, dates, resources, and dependencies

steps.action: Verify the report contains expected schedule data
steps.expectedResult: Report displays accurate schedule information matching the selected parameters

steps.action: Click the 'Export to Excel' button
steps.expectedResult: Export process initiates and Excel file download begins within 5 seconds

steps.action: Wait for the download to complete
steps.expectedResult: Excel file is successfully downloaded to the default downloads folder with naming convention 'ScheduleReport_YYYY-MM-DD.xlsx'

steps.action: Navigate to the downloads folder and locate the exported Excel file
steps.expectedResult: Excel file is present in the downloads folder with correct filename and non-zero file size

steps.action: Open the Excel file using Microsoft Excel or compatible spreadsheet application
steps.expectedResult: Excel file opens without errors or corruption warnings

steps.action: Verify the Excel file contains all schedule data from the generated report
steps.expectedResult: All tasks, dates, resources, dependencies, and other schedule information are present and match the original report

steps.action: Verify data formatting is maintained (dates, numbers, text alignment, headers)
steps.expectedResult: Data is properly formatted with correct date formats, numerical values, column headers are bold, and cells are appropriately aligned

steps.action: Verify data integrity by comparing sample data points between the web report and Excel file
steps.expectedResult: All compared data points match exactly between the web report and Excel export with no data loss or corruption

postconditions: Excel file remains in downloads folder
Original schedule report remains displayed in the browser
User session remains active
Export action is logged in system audit trail
No data is modified in the source system
